Smiting Blades.name: Smiting Blades
Smiting Blades.flavor: A burst of radiance not only chars your foe, but causes its steps to become unsteady.
Smiting Blades.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target hits or misses you or an ally before the end of your next turn, it falls prone and is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Soulfire Mantle.name: Soulfire Mantle
Soulfire Mantle.flavor: Divine wrath pours from your soul and wraps itself around your foe in a searing shroud of justice.
Soulfire Mantle.effect: When the target fails a saving throw, it takes 10 radiant damage and you can teleport it 3 squares (save ends).

Favor the Faithful.name: Favor the Faithful
Favor the Faithful.flavor: Through an act of supreme faith, you channel divine power and your own life force to shield your companions from harm.
Favor the Faithful.trigger: An attack hits you or an ally within range
Favor the Faithful.effect: You spend a healing surge but regain no hit points. The target is completely unaffected by the attack, as though the original attack had not included the target.
